tool.name: ProfRep Masker
tool.description: Tool to mask repetitive regions of original DNA seq based on the repeat regions reported by ProfRep

param.name: input
param.label: Choose your input sequence to be masked

param.name: rp_gff
param.label: Choose GFF file of repetitive regions

tool.help: **WHAT IT DOES** This tool will mask repetitive regions of the original DNA sequence(s) based on repeats GFF. You can choose either lowercase(sequence will be preserved) or "N" mode of masking.
